sentences: Cheb i Sabbah (7 August 1947 â€“ 6 November 2013) was a DJ and composer/producer known for combining Asian, Arabian, and African sounds into his compositions.
In 1989 he began using the stage name "Cheb i Sabbah", which translates to "young of the morning".
He was nominated for the BBC's 2006 Award for World Music in the Club Global category.
Samaya: A Benefit Album For Cheb i Sabbah (2012)
